summary: Develop a shared team inbox system for support/sales teams handling high email volumes. System must include: (1) Multi-tag email categorization with rules-based automatic assignment to teams, (2) Collision prevention for simultaneous replies with locking/warning mechanisms, (3) Advanced search/filtering by tag/assignment/status with reporting on response times and workload, (4) Integration with IMAP/Gmail/O365 without disrupting non-users. Key features: tag-based routing (e.g., 'Billing' → finance team), manual reassignment, 'handled' status marking, first-come-first-served conflict resolution, and comprehensive documentation.
